verses.roman:
dui-vipra-madhye eka vipra--vṛddha-prāya
āra vipra--yuvā, tāṅra karena sahāya

synonyms: dui-vipra-madhye—between the two brāhmaṇas; eka vipra—one brāhmaṇa; vrddha-prāya—elderly man; āra vipra—the second brāhmaṇa; yuvā—young man; tāṅra—of the older brāhmaṇa; karena—does; sahāya—assistance.
translation: One of the two brāhmaṇas was an old man, and the other was young. The young man was assisting the old one.
